title: About
text:
This is a personal website I am making for STAT 37815: Practical R Programming with Extensions with Dr. McShane.
I plan to update this website in the future to reflect my academic and professional journey. Currently, it serves as a platform to showcase my work in statistics, data analysis, and related projects.
Stay tuned for more updates and future additions!

title: Home Page
text: I am a first-year Master of Science student in Statistics at the University of Chicago. I hold a Bachelor of Arts in Mathematics (Statistics track) from Boston University, where I graduated magna cum laude. I have worked on data-driven projects in areas such as health research and predictive modeling. I plan to pursue further studies in biostatistics following the completion of my master’s degree.
